thread.title: Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy

title: Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy
text:
Russian journalists brawl on air over Stalin's legacy 11:34am EST - 00:50 
Two Russian journalists came to blows while broadcasting live on a Moscow radio station over Josef Stalin's role in World War Two, days after the comedy film, ''The Death of Stalin'' was banned in the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Two Russian journalists came to blows while broadcasting live on a Moscow radio station over Josef Stalin's role in World War Two, days after the comedy film, "The Death of Stalin" was banned in the country.
